changeSet.author: Ahmed.Baz
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE ( id int8 NOT NULL, FIRST_NAME varchar(255) NOT NULL, LAST_NAME varchar(255) NOT NULL, EMAIL varchar(255) NOT NULL, SALARY numeric(10) NOT NULL, CREATED_BY int8, LAST_MODIFIED_BY int8, CREATED_AT timestamp(6), DELETED_AT timestamp(6), DELETED_BY int8, LAST_MODIFIED_AT timestamp(6), CONSTRAINT employee_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT employee_email_ukey UNIQUE (EMAIL) );
